attributes.action: create an MPs' Pledge that would provide a set of promises to ensure the public get the service they deserve from their elected Members.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Policing Pledge provides a promise that local police will listen to our concerns, act on them, and update us on the progress they have made. It sets standards for the kind of service we can expect. Why not extend this excellent initiative to an MPs' pledge that will give the public new confidence and improve the relationship between MPs and their constituents?

Such a pledge could include details of who your local MP is, how to contact them, their priorities, describe what they are currently involved in and acting on, a promised minimum level of attendance at Parliament, what issues they are interested in gathering information on, a promise that expenses will be submitted for costs that arise directly from their work and not spent on things like 'adult material', a promise that they will not act against the interests of their constituents, the possibilities go on.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
